meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Ron Ostrow Daniel Mendelsohn Patrick Kerr Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4095.

td.p: Ron Ostrow, an actor from Los Angeles, California
Daniel Mendelsohn, a lawyer from Santa Monica, California
Patrick Kerr, a freelance writer originally from Fort Scott, Kansas (whose 1-day cash winnings total $31,400)

tr.td: ASTRONOMERS
THE THREE STOOGES
OLD ROMAN TIMES
NEW CARS
PHOBIAS
IT COMES BEFORE...

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'In Polish this heliocentric astronomer\'s name is Mikolaj Kopernik')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

tr.td: In Polish this heliocentric astronomer's name is Mikolaj Kopernik

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_2_2', 'clue_J_2_2_stuck', '(Patrick: Who is Larry?)
...
(Alex: Who is [*], yes. Soitenly!)
[laughter]

Curly

PatrickRon
')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_3_2', 'clue_J_3_2_stuck', '(Ron: What is the liver?)
(Alex: Be more specific.)
(Ron: Uh, what is the goose liver, pâté de [*]?)
(Alex: That\'s it. We wanted
"[*]" -- "[**]")

foie gras (fat liver)

Ron
')

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_J_5_4', 'clue_J_5_4_stuck', '(Patrick: What is swimming?)
...
(Alex: I misspoke. I said
"chlorophobia," I believe.
And it\'s "chorophobia" --
a fear of [*].)
(Alex: [After clue 30] We have good news for Patrick,
because I misled you a little while ago in my misreading
of that clue, saying "chloro"
instead of "choro." We do not want to penalize you
the 800 bucks, so we\'ll give it to you now.)

dancing

Triple Stumper
')

Daniel
